title: Initialize workspace and copy templates
acceptance: workspace模板文件齐全（含 error sinks: QUALITY_GATE/RUN_ERRORS）

title: Draft kickoff questions + seed queries
acceptance: DECISIONS含C0问题块；queries.md 已基于 GOAL seed（可留空用于本 pipeline）

title: Extract claims and contributions
acceptance: 每个 claim 可定位到原文段落/页码

title: Audit evidence for each claim
acceptance: 每条 claim 有 evidence 或明确缺口

title: Build novelty/prior-work matrix
acceptance: 至少5篇相关工作（或说明为何不可得）；每行有 overlap/delta 证据说明

title: Write rubric-based review
acceptance: 覆盖 novelty/soundness/clarity/impact 并给出建议

title: Contract audit (artifact contract + target_artifacts)
acceptance: CONTRACT_REPORT.md 状态为 PASS（且无 DONE 输出缺失；target_artifacts 缺失=0）
